contentBlocks.title: General Lighting Requirements
paragraphs: Lighting must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficacy requirements.
Lighting controls must be provided for all artificial lighting.
Lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Lighting Control Requirements
paragraphs: Lighting controls must be provided for all artificial lighting.
Lighting controls must be accessible and clearly labeled.
Lighting controls must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Lighting controls must be suitable for the intended use of the space.

contentBlocks.title: Lighting Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Lighting must meet minimum efficacy requirements as specified in the NCC.
Lighting must be suitable for the intended use of the space.
Lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
